=================
container-patcher
=================


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/container_patcher.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/container_patcher

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/yamagn/container_patcher.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.com/yamagn/container_patcher

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/container-patcher/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://container-patcher.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




A tool to automatically fix vulnerable container packages.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://container-patcher.readthedocs.io.
